评论概述: Know what you are buying and you won't be disappointed
评论详情: For the price, I know these pants were going to be more along the line of costume leather pants and not leather pants you might wear well, for whatever reason OTHER than as costume pants. So as long as you know what you are getting at such an affordable price, you won't be disappointed. However, don't think you are buying high-quality, long-lasting actual leather pants at such a low price and then get upset when they don't meet your expectations. To recap: want costume-quality pants that look decent at a really good price? Buy these. Want high quality, real leather pants, look elsewhere. I recommend these for leather costume pants but not as something to wear otherwise.

评论概述: Decent faux leather jeans for the price.
评论详情: Here's my thoughts on these pants. As always, I'll try to provide details important to fit and overall quality.  First, for a pair of faux leather pants that run about $30, the quality is what you'd expect. It's decent but not absolute perfection. Your standards shouldn't be that high at this price point. If it is... put down the crack pipe. The seams appear to be sewn well, with a few stray threads here and there. The zipper does feel a little on the cheap side. The fish smell that some folks have mentioned in their reviews? Yeah, it's there. I've turned mine inside out & sprayed them with Febreeze, leaving them to air dry outside for a day or two.  Next, the fit. I'm 5'8", 210, with a muscular build & fairly big upper legs. My regular size of jeans is 34-36, depending on designer & cut. These will fit like "skinny jeans." They do have stretch but they're going to be snug. I've ordered the 36's and they are fit to size in the waist and tight in the thigh area. I'd strongly suggest wearing a pair of compression shorts underneath to get them on and off easily. They're slightly long at my height but someone 5'10" to 6', they'd be perfect. However, if you're shorter, the legs are snug enough that you can't really tell they are long.  They seem like they'd be great for stage gear or clubbing. Hope the review helps.
Good fit, good construction, good material, just a little sweaty.
